pr_title: Fix using system AD_User_ID for contact in some places instead of BPartnerContactId

timeline.message:
Fix using system AD_User_ID for contact in some places instead of BPartnerContactId

timeline.bodyText: that's OK, but next time, please use CoalesceUtil.firstGreaterThanZero(int...)
